mapper.select:
SELECT dc.id, dc.cache_type, dc.cache_key, dc.cache_value, dc.remark, dc.object_version_number, dc.creation_date, dc.created_by, dc.last_updated_by, dc.last_update_date FROM db_cache dc WHERE 1 = 1
AND dc.cache_type like concat('%', concat(#{cacheType, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND dc.cache_key like concat('%', concat(#{cacheKey, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND dc.cache_value like concat('%', concat(#{cacheValue, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, '%'))
